metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7103 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in jQuery UI before 1.12.0 mightallow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via thecloseText parameter of the dialog function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7103` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-jquery-ui - 1.12.1+dfsg-4
node-jquery-ui - 1.12.1+dfsg-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jqueryui package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.1+dfsg-4').
